directions: Combine the baking mix, vegetable oil, egg and pudding mix in a bowl.  Mix well.  Stir in the nuts or chocolate chips (optional).
Place teaspoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet.  Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes or until toothpick comes clean.
ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
title: Pudding Cookies I
